channel.title: resticted video settings (no high shadows etc.)
channel.description: I know that this isn't a bug/issue specific to Black Mesa, but Source engine games across the board, but I'm wondering if there is a solution, if the devs know something about this, I would like to enjoy Black Mesa maxed out on my hardware, as limited as it may be, i'm sure it supports High quality shadows.

item.title: resticted video settings (no high shadows etc.)
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
I know that this isn’t a bug/issue specific to Black Mesa, but Source engine games across the board, but I’m wondering if there is a solution, if the devs know something about this, I would like to enjoy Black Mesa maxed out on my hardware, as limited as it may be, i’m sure it supports High quality shadows.

Read full topic
